## Background Images

- `background-repeat: no-repeat` will prevent the image to repeat and fill
- `background-size: cover` will make the image occupy the containers full width
- `background-position: center`  will align the image 



# tips

* Use the Columns COL COL Pattern
* remember that parent dimensions must first be set).
* Set Absolute values in master parent container
* use modifiers to set fixed width percentages
* use flexbox spacing to create space between elements
